verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> In thee O LORD חָ֭סִיתִי <S%H2620><s%> do I put my trust אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay אֵב֣וֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> be ashamed לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> In בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> me in thy righteousness פַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6403><s%> deliver

הַטֵּ֤ה <S%H5186><s%> Bow down אֵלַ֨י ׀ <S%H413><s%> about אָזְנְךָ֮ <S%H241><s%> thine ear מְהֵרָ֪ה <S%H4120><s%> me speedily הַצִּ֫ילֵ֥נִי <S%H5337><s%> to me deliver הֱיֵ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֨י ׀ לְֽצוּר־ <S%H6697><s%> rock מָ֭עוֹז <S%H4581><s%> be thou my strong לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for an house מְצוּד֗וֹת <S%H4686><s%> of defence לְהוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> to save

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for סַלְעִ֣י <S%H5553><s%> For thou [art] my rock וּמְצוּדָתִ֣י <S%H4686><s%> and my fortress אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you וּלְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> sake שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> therefore for thy name's תַּֽנְחֵ֥נִי <S%H5148><s%> sake lead וּֽתְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5095><s%> me and guide

תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נִי <S%H3318><s%> Pull me out מֵרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> of the net ז֭וּ <S%H2098><s%> that טָ֣מְנוּ <S%H2934><s%> they have laid privily לִ֑י כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַ֝תָּה <S%H859><s%> You מָֽעוּזִּֽי׃ <S%H4581><s%> for me for thou [art] my strength

בְּיָדְךָ֮ <S%H3027><s%> Into thine hand אַפְקִ֪יד <S%H6485><s%> I commit ר֫וּחִ֥י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit פָּדִ֖יתָה <S%H6299><s%> thou hast redeemed אוֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> me O LORD אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God אֱמֶֽת׃ <S%H571><s%> of truth

שָׂנֵ֗אתִי <S%H8130><s%> I have hated הַשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <S%H8104><s%> them that regard הַבְלֵי־ <S%H1892><s%> vanities שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> lying וַ֝אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD בָּטָֽחְתִּי׃ <S%H982><s%> but I trust

אָגִ֥ילָה <S%H1523><s%> I will be glad וְאֶשְׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8055><s%> and rejoice בְּחַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <S%H2617><s%> in thy mercy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Because רָ֭אִיתָ <S%H7200><s%> for thou hast considered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָנְיִ֑י <S%H6040><s%> my trouble יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou hast known בְּצָר֥וֹת <S%H6869><s%> in adversities נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not הִ֭סְגַּרְתַּנִי <S%H5462><s%> And hast not shut me up בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אוֹיֵ֑ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתָּ <S%H5975><s%> thou hast set בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב <S%H4800><s%> in a large room רַגְלָֽי׃ <S%H7272><s%> my feet

חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> upon me O LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> I am in צַ֫ר־ <S%H6887><s%> for I am in trouble לִ֥י עָשְׁשָׁ֖ה <S%H6244><s%> is consumed בְכַ֥עַס <S%H3708><s%> with grief עֵינִ֗י <S%H5869><s%> mine eye נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> [yea] my soul וּבִטְנִֽי׃ <S%H990><s%> and my belly

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל֪וּ <S%H3615><s%> is spent בְיָג֡וֹן <S%H3015><s%> with grief חַיַּי֮ <S%H2416><s%> For my life וּשְׁנוֹתַ֪י <S%H8141><s%> and my years בַּאֲנָ֫חָ֥ה <S%H585><s%> with sighing כָּשַׁ֣ל <S%H3782><s%> faileth בַּעֲוֹנִ֣י <S%H5771><s%> because of mine iniquity כֹחִ֑י <S%H3581><s%> my strength וַעֲצָמַ֥י <S%H6106><s%> and my bones עָשֵֽׁשׁוּ׃ <S%H6244><s%> are consumed

מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all צֹרְרַ֨י <S%H6887><s%> among all mine enemies הָיִ֪יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become חֶרְפָּ֡ה <S%H2781><s%> I was a reproach וְלִשֲׁכֵנַ֨י ׀ <S%H7934><s%> among my neighbours מְאֹד֮ <S%H3966><s%> but especially וּפַ֪חַד <S%H6343><s%> and a fear לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י <S%H3045><s%> to mine acquaintance רֹאַ֥י <S%H7200><s%> they that did see בַּח֑וּץ <S%H2351><s%> me without נָדְד֥וּ <S%H5074><s%> fled מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> Because

נִ֭שְׁכַּחְתִּי <S%H7911><s%> I am forgotten כְּמֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> as a dead man מִלֵּ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> out of mind הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> I am כִּכְלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> vessel אֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H6><s%> I am like a broken

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֨עְתִּי ׀ <S%H8085><s%> For I have heard דִּבַּ֥ת <S%H1681><s%> the slander רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> of many מָג֪וֹר <S%H4032><s%> fear מִסָּ֫בִ֥יב <S%H5439><s%> [was] on every side בְּהִוָּסְדָ֣ם <S%H3245><s%> while they took counsel יַ֣חַד <S%H3162><s%> together עָלַ֑י <S%H5921><s%> against לָקַ֖חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take away נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> my life זָמָֽמוּ׃ <S%H2161><s%> against me they devised

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and בָטַ֣חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> But I trusted יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in thee O LORD אָ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אֱלֹהַ֥י <S%H430><s%> Thou [art] my God אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

בְּיָדְךָ֥ <S%H3027><s%> [are] in thy hand עִתֹּתָ֑י <S%H6256><s%> My times הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי <S%H5337><s%> deliver מִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> me from the hand א֝וֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> of mine enemies וּמֵרֹדְפָֽי׃ <S%H7291><s%> and from them that persecute

הָאִ֣ירָה <S%H215><s%> to shine פָ֭נֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> Make thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> upon thy servant ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <S%H3467><s%> save בְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> me for thy mercies'

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay אֵ֭בוֹשָׁה <S%H954><s%> Let me not be ashamed כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for קְרָאתִ֑יךָ <S%H7121><s%> for I have called יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> be ashamed רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> upon thee let the wicked יִדְּמ֥וּ <S%H1826><s%> [and] let them be silent לִשְׁאֽוֹל׃ <S%H7585><s%> in the grave

תֵּ֥אָלַ֗מְנָה <S%H481><s%> be put to silence שִׂפְתֵ֫י <S%H8193><s%> lips שָׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Let the lying הַדֹּבְר֖וֹת <S%H1696><s%> which speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> against the righteous עָתָ֗ק <S%H6277><s%> grievous בְּגַאֲוָ֥ה <S%H1346><s%> things proudly וָבֽוּז׃ <S%H937><s%> and contemptuously

מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> How רַֽב־ <S%H7227><s%> [Oh] how great טוּבְךָ֮ <S%H2898><s%> [is] thy goodness אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which צָפַ֪נְתָּ <S%H6845><s%> which thou hast laid up לִּֽירֵ֫אֶ֥יךָ <S%H3373><s%> for them that fear פָּ֭עַלְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> thee [which] thou hast wrought לַחֹסִ֣ים <S%H2620><s%> for them that trust בָּ֑ךְ נֶ֝֗גֶד <S%H5048><s%> about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> in thee before the sons אָדָם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

תַּסְתִּירֵ֤ם ׀ <S%H5641><s%> Thou shalt hide בְּסֵ֥תֶר <S%H5643><s%> them in the secret פָּנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> of thy presence מֵֽרֻכְסֵ֫י <S%H7407><s%> from the pride אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man תִּצְפְּנֵ֥ם <S%H6845><s%> thou shalt keep them secretly בְּסֻכָּ֗ה <S%H5521><s%> in a pavilion מֵרִ֥יב <S%H7379><s%> from the strife לְשֹׁנֽוֹת׃ <S%H3956><s%> of tongues

בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְלִ֘יא <S%H6381><s%> for he hath shewed me his marvellous חַסְדּ֥וֹ <S%H2617><s%> kindness לִ֝֗י בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city מָצֽוֹר׃ <S%H4692><s%> in a strong

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I אָ֘מַ֤רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> For I said בְחָפְזִ֗י <S%H2648><s%> in my haste נִגְרַזְתִּי֮ <S%H1629><s%> I am cut off מִנֶּ֪גֶד <S%H5048><s%> from before עֵ֫ינֶ֥יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes אָכֵ֗ן <S%H403><s%> nevertheless שָׁ֭מַעְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> thou heardest ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice תַּחֲנוּנַ֗י <S%H8469><s%> of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֥י <S%H7768><s%> when I cried אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אֶֽהֱב֥וּ <S%H157><s%> O love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֲסִ֫ידָ֥יו <S%H2623><s%> all ye his saints אֱ֭מוּנִים <S%H539><s%> the faithful נֹצֵ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> preserveth יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [for] the LORD וּמְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> rewardeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֝֗תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and plentifully עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> doer גַאֲוָֽה׃ <S%H1346><s%> the proud

חִ֭זְקוּ <S%H2388><s%> Be of good courage וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> and he shall strengthen לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> your heart כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֝מְיַחֲלִ֗ים <S%H3176><s%> all ye that hope לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD
